channel.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
channel.description:
I figured when it comes down to it, the ultimate gaming system doesnt mean shit if you dont have good games to play on it.
So which system has better video games on it? PS3 or Xbox 360?

item.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
You might want to clarify that you mean God of War before some Microsoftfag comes by and says “lolgeersfowaaaaaaaaaaawr is 4 360 lol”

CTID:

I would actually assume they’re probably best on a PC because you can use steering wheel and gas/brake/clutch pedal peripherals instead of a gamepad.

EDIT: Shit, forgot what thread I was in. Heh.

You can buy those things for PS3 afaik.

item.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
They go hand in hand. You’re not going to be able to compare the games without people coming in here and spouting “lol ps3 sux0rs” or the opposite.

Personally, I’d get a PS3 because most “Xbox exclusives” at least eventually come out on the PC, so you can use your PS3 for its exclusives, and the multiplatform games.

Read full topic

item.description:
TheKeeper:

Whichever console makes you pay for online play, something that really has no reason for, is a clear indication that its a fuckup. Hmmm, I’d like to get this DLC, but wait its 400 microsoft points. Damn they only sale in brackets of 500pts… WTF??? Kids just kids. Stick with PC and steam. Thats all you need.

Ohh dear…

item.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
item.dc:creator: RebornShadow
item.description:
Dang… wrong topic D:

/edit
Hehe… both have great exclusives.

PS3 has for example Heavy Rain and Killzone.
Xbox 360 has the Halo Series and Gears of War.

But I prefer the PS3 exclusives.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I prefer the 360 more because of the controller. I mean the ps3’s controller is too small, yet the sticks are too far out and the shoulder buttons are too far up. The 360 controllr its in my hand as if it were air. That’s enough of a deciding factor as each console have at least 2 games that fill every niche I could want.

The fact is, 360 games collectively are no bettor or worse than ps3 ones, as all the exclusives are made to compete with one another. When this happens, devs stop one upping each other and start "just as good"ing each other.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 games vs. PS3 games
item.dc:creator: Fartingo
item.description:
XBox 360:

-Halo series (deal with it)
-Gears of War series
-Ace Combat 6
-Armored Core 4
-Chromehounds

PS3:

-MGS4
-Ratchet and Clank series
-Uncharted 1 and 2 (mediocre)
-Resistance 1 and 2 (EXTREMELY mediocre)
-and hopefully one day Jak 4 and Gex 4 (someday…)

As much as I love PS3 I prefer my multiplatform games on 360, with the exception of Valve games, which are at home on PC in the first place.

Read full topic
